description:

We provide rental service for tenants and property management services for our commercial clients and homeowners.

We lease the apartment through our Corporate Leasing Program and you have a home to reside in. If you have less than perfect credit, we can assist you with your new apartment/home in the DMV area.

title: Beautifully Renovated 2BR-2BA Apartment
description:
Beautifully Renovated bi level 2 bed 2 bath apartment in Brewerytown, blocks away from Fairmount Park and many excellent restaurants and bars. This perfectly located building is a five minute walk to Kelly drive and the Art Museum! Walking distance to Fairmount Avenue. It also has access to five bus routes, and only a 10 minutes drive to Center City or Fishtown. Charming, custom eat in kitchen with antique 1940's cast iron stove which has been converted to electric, glass front cabinets and granite counters. A nice size dining room with beautiful stonework is adjacent to the kitchen. A Large deck is accessed from the kitchen and has stairs to the backyard. A large laundry/storage room are also on the first floor. Unit comes with stacked washer and dryer in unit, and joint access to the basement for plenty of storage.
Owner Pays water and trash, tenant responsible for gas and electric.
Location-914 N 29th St #2, Philadelphia, PA 19130

title: ##### Newly renovated 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom#####
description:
If you are looking for a home in Dickinson Narrows with a lot of space, look no further! This charming, tree-lined block is unique because it features extra long lots.  This particular home is on a 68 feet long lot, which is almost twice as long as many other homes in the area- and it has it's original brick front with arched windows and original trim. Enter into the large living room with decorative fireplace with a large open-plan dining room and kitchen beyond.  The remodeled kitchen has plenty of storage space, as well as quartz countertops and stainless steel appliances.  To the rear is a full bathroom and conveniently-located laundry room.  On the second floor, you'll find the large owner's suite in the rear with walk-in closet, a remodeled full three piece bathroom, and two other large bedrooms.  The full basement is unfinished but provides plenty of room for extra living area or storage.  Close to Dickinson Square Park, cafes like Grindcore and Cafe Creme Brulee, and a short walk to Bok, this home is in a prime location where values keep rising!

title: 1 bedroom/1 bathroom New Hope/Solebury
description:
Furnished 1bed/1bath, approximately 500 sq ft apartment in Solebury, 2-3 miles from center of New Hope, guest house on 10+ acre property. Apartment includes newly renovated kitchen with high quality appliances: induction stove, Wolf countertop oven, coffee maker, microwave, full size dishwasher, and reverse osmosis tap for drinking water. Brand new cabinets have plenty of storage. Furnished with dishware, silverware, cooking utensils, pots, pans, etc.
Living room can be adapted to fit your needs, for relaxing, or into a home office if you prefer.
Bedroom has queen size bed, with brand new Crate & Barrel linens. Full size dresser, comfy lounging chair, linen closet, and walk-in closet for your clothing and storage. Blackout curtains on all windows. Full laundry (washer and dryer) in a separate laundry closet.
Outside the second floor apartment is a propane grill for your use, as well as two Adirondack chairs and a concrete pad if you would like to bring a small fire pit. Parking for one car is included.
Apartment has 1 window air conditioning unit installed in the bedroom, and we can install a 2nd window unit in the living room if you would like.
$1500 monthly, short term rentals ok. Small dogs are allowed, but no large dogs or cats. No smoking. Two months security deposit and background/credit check required.
Please email with your phone number to arrange a time to see the apartment.
